name: medieval
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 related to the Middle Ages (= the period in European history from about AD 600 to AD 1500): a medieval building/painting/town a medieval manuscript
More examplesFewer examplesYou really should go and see the lovely medieval court in the castle.This tradition dates back to medieval times.Miller's fascination with medieval art dates from her childhood.This church is a perfect example of medieval architecture.In medieval Europe, many women were accused of being witches and were burned at the stake.

of or from the Middle Ages (= the period in the past from about 500 to 1500): The tunnels were dug in medieval times as an escape route.
